_comment: NPC schedule and personality data for Havenwood Hollow. Defines daily routines, locations, and dialogue triggers.

npcs.personality: Warm but cautious. Knows everyone's secrets. Motherly toward the player.

schedule.raidBehavior: Hides in store cellar

npcs.personality: Gruff, taciturn. Respects hard work. Has a hidden soft side for animals.

schedule.raidBehavior: Defends town gate with hammer

npcs.personality: Mysterious, knowledgeable. Speaks in riddles. Fascinated by the player's arrival.

schedule.raidBehavior: Casts protective wards, heals defenders

npcs.personality: Conflicted. Devout yet drawn to forbidden knowledge. Protective of the village.

schedule.raidBehavior: Leads villagers to church sanctuary, blesses weapons

npcs.personality: Morbidly cheerful. Talks to the dead. Surprisingly insightful about the Hollow's history.

schedule.raidBehavior: Expert at spotting undead weaknesses, scouts enemy positions

npcs.personality: Boisterous, warm. The social hub of the village. Knows all the gossip.

schedule.raidBehavior: Barricades tavern, serves as emergency shelter

npcs.personality: Pompous and long-winded, but genuinely cares about Havenwood Hollow's survival. Obsessed with civic order even as darkness encroaches.

schedule.raidBehavior: Organizes civilian evacuation to town hall, issues orders from safety

npcs.personality: Cheerful and relentlessly optimistic despite the gloom. Rises before dawn and hums while she works.

schedule.raidBehavior: Shelters in bakery cellar, rations bread for survivors

npcs.personality: Methodical and clinical, with an unsettling fascination with anatomy. His cures work, but his bedside manner is ice-cold.

schedule.raidBehavior: Sets up triage station at clinic, treats wounded defenders

npcs.personality: Painfully shy and soft-spoken, but harbors dark secrets about the Hollow's true history hidden within her books.

schedule.raidBehavior: Hides in library vault, protects the ancient texts at all costs

npcs.personality: Grizzled and weathered old sailor who settled inland. Tells tall tales of sea monsters that might not be so tall after all.

schedule.raidBehavior: Guards the docks, uses harpoon against attackers

npcs.personality: Elegant and sharp-tongued, she weaves gossip as deftly as she weaves fabric. Nothing escapes her notice.

schedule.raidBehavior: Hides in tailor shop, sews bandages for the wounded

npcs.personality: Stern and disciplined military veteran. Carries old battle scars and older regrets. Fiercely protective of the town.

schedule.raidBehavior: Commands town defense, leads counterattack from guardpost

npcs.personality: A nature-loving dreamer who sees beauty even in the Hollow's twisted flora. She talks to her plants and swears they talk back.

schedule.raidBehavior: Retreats to flower shop, uses herbal smoke to repel lesser creatures

npcs.personality: A quiet, steady craftsman who lets his woodwork speak for him. Rarely says more than a few words, but every one counts.

schedule.raidBehavior: Reinforces barricades, repairs damaged structures mid-raid

npcs.personality: Elara's mentor and a grandmother figure to many. Ancient, wise, and unyielding. She remembers what the Hollow was before the darkness came.

schedule.raidBehavior: Wards her cottage with ancient protections, shelters anyone who finds her

npcs.personality: Enigmatic and silver-tongued, he appears seasonally with wares no one can explain. His origins are unknown and he prefers it that way.

weekend.activity: Late night deals in the corner

schedule.raidBehavior: Vanishes mysteriously before raids, reappears unscathed after

npcs.personality: Curious, fearless, and a born troublemaker. She sneaks into places she shouldn't and always has dirt on her face and mischief in her eyes.

schedule.raidBehavior: Hides under beds in orphanage, secretly brave and helps other children stay calm

npcs.personality: Strict but deeply caring. She pushes her students hard because she knows the Hollow demands strength. Hides her fear behind discipline.

schedule.raidBehavior: Gathers all children into the schoolhouse cellar, guards them fiercely

npcs.personality: Jolly and portly, Rosalind's husband. He runs the rooms upstairs while she runs the bar. Laughs loudly and cooks hearty stews.

schedule.raidBehavior: Helps Rosalind barricade tavern, cooks for sheltering villagers

npcs.personality: Tough and superstitious. Refuses to mine on certain days and leaves offerings at the mine entrance. His hands shake when he speaks of what he's seen below.

weekday.activity: Drinks to forget what he saw

schedule.raidBehavior: Seals the mine entrance, fights with pickaxe

npcs.personality: Mysterious and prophetic, she speaks in visions and half-truths. Her predictions are unsettlingly accurate, and her eyes see things others cannot.

schedule.raidBehavior: Forewarns the town of incoming raids, chants protective incantations

npcs.personality: Deathly pale with a bone-dry sense of morbid humor. He takes pride in giving the dead a proper send-off and finds the living exhausting.

schedule.raidBehavior: Ensures the dead stay dead, patrols graveyard with holy water

npcs.personality: Gentle and soft-spoken around animals, awkward around people. She has a gift for calming even the most spooked creatures.

schedule.raidBehavior: Calms panicked animals, leads livestock to safety

npcs.personality: A grizzled old warrior who settled on the outskirts. Tells war stories that sound exaggerated until you see his scars. Haunted by what he's fought.

schedule.raidBehavior: Grabs his old sword and fights on the front lines

npcs.personality: Clumsy but talented, she works under Elara and causes small explosions regularly. Her enthusiasm outpaces her skill, but she's learning fast.

schedule.raidBehavior: Mixes emergency potions, hands them out to defenders

npcs.personality: An eager young man who idolizes Gregor. Strong as an ox but naive about the world. He dreams of forging a legendary weapon someday.

weekday.activity: Lights the forge before Gregor arrives

schedule.raidBehavior: Fights alongside Gregor at the town gate with a heavy hammer

npcs.personality: A fallen aristocrat haunted by her family's dark past. She clings to faded elegance and speaks of the manor as though it still stands in its former glory.

weekday.activity: Takes lunch alone at a corner table
Returns to the ruins to sleep

schedule.raidBehavior: Retreats deep into the manor ruins' hidden cellars

npcs.personality: A quiet tracker who lives in the forest and knows its paths better than anyone. He speaks rarely, moves silently, and trusts the woods more than people.

schedule.raidBehavior: Scouts enemy movements from the treeline, picks off threats with arrows

npcs.personality: Devout and kind, she assists Father Ashton at the church. Her faith is genuine and unwavering, a rare light in the Hollow's darkness.

schedule.raidBehavior: Prays over the wounded, provides comfort and first aid in the church sanctuary
